issue.message: This getter should be public such that `useRepeatingSurface` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "listener", in androidx.camera.core.impl.ImageReaderProxy.setOnImageAvailableListener) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
